title: Theatrum Scoti√¶ containing the prospects of Their Majesties castles and palaces : together with those of the most considerable towns and colleges, the ruins of many ancient abbeys, churches, monasteries and convents, within the said kingdom : all curiously engraven on copper plates, with a short description of each place / by John Slezer ...
author: Slezer, John, d. 1714.
publisher: Printed by John Leake for Abell Swalle ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Proclamation at beginning of work signed: J. Trenchard.
The descriptions drawn up by Sir R. Sibbald were intended to be published in Latin, but were inaccurately translated into English without leave or acknowledgement of the author.
